page.title: 12A small fen farm 3
page.content: Very rarely he looses crops from diseases, but he said once he lost his potatoes from a disease called Blight. But the crop sprays are very good now and the worst thing is the weather. He can loose sugar-beet if there is a strong wind, he also looses a lot of crops in the spring. He has a lot of crop sprays but he told us that the 3 main sprays are: Pesticide, (kills pests and insects), Hebicide, (kills weeds) and Fungicide (which controls disease). He has 4 wheeled tractors, and 1 crawler. He has 1 combine, 1 beat harvester, 1 potato harvester, 1 corn drill, 1 sugar beat drill, 1 potato planter, 1 bailer, ploughs, harrows and cultivaters. Altogether he has 15 machines, he said that he is really glad that he has all his machines because without he'd do it by hand.
